thread.title: Ground News - Severe weather alerts: Storms and floods could hit parts of SA this weekend
thread.title_full: Ground News - Severe weather alerts: Storms and floods could hit parts of SA this weekend

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Severe weather alerts: Storms and floods could hit parts of SA this weekend
text:
Summary by Ground News SA Weather Service issues severe weather alerts for three provinces and rain is expected in other parts of the country. The national government urged residents to take precautions and follow instructions from their respective disaster management centres. The National Sea Rescue Institute has also warned people to be cautious around the coastline. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
News24 Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: 24.com Severe weather alerts: Storms and floods could hit parts of SA this weekend Residents in the Western Cape, Northern Cape and North West should brace themselves for severe weather this weekend, following several alerts from the South African Weather Service (SAWS). Rain can also be expected in several other provinces.
